pub.citation: Douglas, N. A. and P. S. Manos. 2007. Molecular phylogeny of Nyctaginaceae: taxonomy, biogeography, and characters associated with a radiation of xerophytic genera in North America. American Journal of Botany 94: 856-872.

pmmd.notes: Maximum-likelihood (ML) topology from the analysis of the entire data set. Parsimony bootstrap/ML bootstrap support values above branches, Bayesian posterior probability from the "B6" analysis below branches, "-" indicates bootstrap support value <50. tribes of Nyctaginaceae according to Bittrich and Khn (1993) are in bold. "-" before unbold name signifies a subtribe of tribe Nyctagineae
